tool_description: Manage customer support tickets, agents and monitoring.
name: Freshdesk
title: Freshdesk

api_list.name: addNoteToTicket

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

required_parameters.name: body
required_parameters.description: Content of the note in HTML

optional_parameters.name: incoming
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if a particular note should appear as being created from outside (i.e., not through web portal). The default value is false

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the agent/user who is adding the note

optional_parameters.name: private
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if the note is private. The default value is true.

optional_parameters.name: attachments
optional_parameters.description: Attachments associated with the note. The total size of all of a ticket's attachments cannot exceed 15MB.

optional_parameters.name: notifyEmails
optional_parameters.description: Email addresses of agents/users who need to be notified about this note

api_list.name: createComment

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

required_parameters.name: body
required_parameters.description: Content of the comment in HTML

api_list.name: createCompany

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the company

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: Any specific note about the company

optional_parameters.name: customFields
optional_parameters.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields. Only dates in the format YYYY-MM-DD are accepted as input for custom date fields. Example: 'custom_fields':{'gadget':'Cold Welder'}

optional_parameters.name: domains
optional_parameters.description: Domains of the company. Email addresses of contacts that contain this domain will be associated with that company automatically.

api_list.name: createContact

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: Telephone number of the contact

optional_parameters.name: twitterId
optional_parameters.description: Twitter handle of the contact

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Primary email address of the contact. If you want to associate additional email(s) with this contact, use the other_emails attribute.

optional_parameters.name: mobile
optional_parameters.description: Mobile number of the contact

optional_parameters.name: viewAllTickets
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if the contact can see all the tickets that are associated with the company to which he belong

optional_parameters.name: companyId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the primary company to which this contact belongs

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language of the contact. Default language is en. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Language feature is enabled (Garden plan and above)

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: Address of the contact.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A small description of the contact

optional_parameters.name: jobTitle
optional_parameters.description: Job title of the contact

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description: Time zone of the contact. Default value is the time zone of the domain. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Time Zone feature is enabled (Garden plan and above)

optional_parameters.name: otherEmails
optional_parameters.description: Additional emails associated with the contact

optional_parameters.name: otherCompanies
optional_parameters.description: Additional companies associated with the contact. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Companies feature is enabled (Estate plan and above)

optional_parameters.name: customFields
optional_parameters.description: Key value pairs containing the name and value of the custom field. Only dates in the format YYYY-MM-DD are accepted as input for custom date fields. Example: 'custom_fields':{'gadget':'Cold Welder'}

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: List tags associated with this contact

api_list.name: createForum

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Unique name of the forum category

required_parameters.name: forumType
required_parameters.description: Denotes the type of forum. 1 - How To's, 2- Ideas, 3 -Problems, 4 - Announcements

required_parameters.name: forumVisibility
required_parameters.description: Denotes the visibility level of the forum. 1 - Everyone, 2 - Logged in users only, 3 - Agents only, 4 - Users in specific companies only

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the forum category

optional_parameters.name: companyIdList
optional_parameters.description: List of CompanyID. If forumVisibility property is set to 4, the forum is only visible to users belonging to certain companies. Example: 1,2,3

api_list.name: createForumCategory

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Unique name of the forum category

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the forum category

api_list.name: createGroup

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: unassignedFor
optional_parameters.description: The time after which an escalation email will be sent if a ticket remains unassigned. The accepted values are '30m' for 30 minutes, '1h' for 1 hour, '2h' for 2 hour, '4h' for 4 hour, '8h' for 8 hour, '12h' for 12 hour, '1d' for 1 day, '2d' for 2days, '3d' for 3 days. The default value is '30m'

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the group

optional_parameters.name: escalateTo
optional_parameters.description: The user to whom the escalation email is sent of a ticket is unassigned. To create/update escalate_to with 'none' provide the value 'null' in the request

optional_parameters.name: autoTicketAssign
optional_parameters.description: Describes the automatic ticket assignment type. Will not be supported if the 'Round Robin' feature is disabled for the account. The default value is false

optional_parameters.name: agentIdList
optional_parameters.description: List of Agent's ID

api_list.name: createSolutionArticle

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the solution article. (1 - permenant, 2 - workaround)

required_parameters.name: status
required_parameters.description: Status of the solution article. (1 - draft, 2 - published)

optional_parameters.name: metaTitle
optional_parameters.description: Part of SEO-data

optional_parameters.name: metaDescription
optional_parameters.description: Part of SEO-data

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: List of strings. Tags that have been associated with the solution article

optional_parameters.name: metaKeywords
optional_parameters.description: List of keywords. Part of SEO-data

api_list.name: createSolutionCategory

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Unique name of the solution category

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the solution category

optional_parameters.name: visibleInPortals
optional_parameters.description: List of portal IDs where this category is visible. Allowed only if the account is configured with multiple portals. Example: 1,2,3

api_list.name: getAllTicketFields

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

api_list.name: createSolutionFolder
api_list.description: Create Solution Folder in Solution Category

required_parameters.name: visibility
required_parameters.description: Accessibility of this folder. 1 - All Users, 2 - Logged in Users, 3 - Agents, 4 - Selected Companies.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Unique name of the solution folder

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the solution folder

optional_parameters.name: companyIds
optional_parameters.description: List of IDs of the companies to whom this solution folder is visible. Example: 1,2,3

api_list.name: createTicket

required_parameters.name: subject
required_parameters.description: Subject of the ticket. The default Value is null.

required_parameters.name: status
required_parameters.description: Status of the ticket. The default Value is 2.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

required_parameters.name: priority
required_parameters.description: Priority of the ticket. The default value is 1.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the requester

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: Phone number of the requester. If no contact exists with this phone number in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact. If the phone number is set and the email address is not, then the name attribute is mandatory.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Email address of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact.

optional_parameters.name: twitterId
optional_parameters.description: Twitter handle of the requester. If no contact exists with this handle in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact.

optional_parameters.name: responderId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the agent to whom the ticket has been assigned

optional_parameters.name: requesterId
optional_parameters.description: User ID of the requester. For existing contacts, the requester_id can be passed instead of the requester's email.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Helps categorize the ticket according to the different kinds of issues your support team deals with. The default Value is null.

optional_parameters.name: facebookId
optional_parameters.description: Facebook ID of the requester. If no contact exists with this facebook_id, then a new contact will be created.

optional_parameters.name: emailConfigId
optional_parameters.description: ID of email config which is used for this ticket. (i.e.,  support@yourcompany.com/sales@yourcompany.com) If product_id is given and email_config_id is not given, product's primary email_config_id will be set

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: The channel through which the ticket was created. The default value is 2.

optional_parameters.name: groupId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the group to which the ticket has been assigned. The default value is the ID of the group that is associated with the given email_config_id

optional_parameters.name: dueBy
optional_parameters.description: Date that denotes when the ticket is due to be resolved

optional_parameters.name: frDueBy
optional_parameters.description: Date that denotes when the first response is due

optional_parameters.name: productId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the product to which the ticket is associated. It will be ignored if the email_config_id attribute is set in the request.

optional_parameters.name: companyId
optional_parameters.description: Company ID of the requester. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Companies feature is enabled (Estate plan and above)

optional_parameters.name: attachments
optional_parameters.description: Array of file links (url). The total size of these attachments cannot exceed 15MB.

optional_parameters.name: ccEmails
optional_parameters.description: Array of email address added in the 'cc' field of the incoming ticket email

optional_parameters.name: customFields
optional_parameters.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields. Example: 'custom_fields':{'gadget':'Cold Welder'}

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Array of tags that have been associated with the ticket

api_list.name: createTimeEntry

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: timeSpent
optional_parameters.description: The number of hours (in hh:mm format). Used to set the total time_spent

optional_parameters.name: billable
optional_parameters.description: Set as true if the entry is billable. Default value is true

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: Description on this time-entry

optional_parameters.name: agentId
optional_parameters.description: The agent to whom this time-entry is associated. One agent can have only one timer running. Everything else will be stopped if new timer is on for an agent

optional_parameters.name: executedAt
optional_parameters.description: Time at which this time-entry id added/created

optional_parameters.name: startTime
optional_parameters.description: The time at which the time-entry is added or the time of the last invoked 'start-timer' action using a toggle

optional_parameters.name: timerRunning
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if the timer is running

api_list.name: createTopic

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: sticky
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if the topic should stay on top of the forum for additional visibility

optional_parameters.name: locked
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if the topic is locked which means that no more posts can be added to the topic

api_list.name: createTranslatedSolutionArticle

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of the solution article. (1 - permenant, 2 - workaround)

required_parameters.name: status

optional_parameters.name: metaDescription
optional_parameters.description: Part of SEO-data

optional_parameters.name: metaTitle
optional_parameters.description: Part of SEO-data

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: List of strings. Tags that have been associated with the solution article

optional_parameters.name: metaKeywords
optional_parameters.description: List of keywords. Part of SEO-data

api_list.name: createTranslatedSolutionCategory
api_list.description: Create a translated solution category to original solution Category ID

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Unique name of the solution category

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: Create a translated solution category. (Multilingual Feature must be enabled for the account. Supported languages have to be configured from Admin > General Settings > Helpdesk. Configured languages can be retrieved from Helpdesk Settings)

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the solution category

optional_parameters.name: visibleInPortals
optional_parameters.description: List of portal IDs where this category is visible. Allowed only if the account is configured with multiple portals. Example: 1,2,3

optional_parameters.name: companyIds

api_list.name: getAllTickets
api_list.description: Use filters to view only specific tickets (those which match the criteria that you choose). By default only tickets that have not been deleted or marked as spam will be returned, unless you use the 'deleted' filter.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: companyId
optional_parameters.description: Find Tickets be Company ID

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: Find Tickets by userId

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: Order Tickets by created_at, due_by, updated_at, status. Default: created_at

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Find Tickets by e-mail

optional_parameters.name: updatedSince
optional_parameters.description: By default only tickets that have been created within the past 30 days will be returned. For older tickets, use this field. Example: 2017-03-27 (ISO 8601)

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: The various filters available are new_and_my_open, watching, spam, deleted

optional_parameters.name: orderType
optional_parameters.description: asc/desc. Default: desc

api_list.name: getAllTimeEntries
api_list.description: Use filters to view only specific time entries (those which match the criteria that you choose). The filters listed in the table below can also be combined.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: executedBefore
optional_parameters.description: Filter by Executed Before time

optional_parameters.name: agentId
optional_parameters.description: Filter by Agent ID

optional_parameters.name: billable
optional_parameters.description: Filter by billable

optional_parameters.name: executedAfter
optional_parameters.description: Filter by Executed After time

optional_parameters.name: companyId
optional_parameters.description: Filter by Company ID

api_list.name: getSingleTicket
api_list.description: Find Ticket by ID. By default, certain fields such as conversations, company name and requester email will not be included in the response. They can be retrieved via the embedding functionality for extra API request points.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: includeConversations
optional_parameters.description: Will return ten conversations sorted by 'created_at' in ascending order. Including conversations will consume two API calls. In order to access more than ten conversations belonging to a ticket, use the getTicketConversations. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: includeCompany
optional_parameters.description: Will return the company's id and name. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: includeStats
optional_parameters.description: Will return the ticket’s closed_at, resolved_at and first_responded_at time. Default: false

optional_parameters.name: includeRequester
optional_parameters.description: Will return the requester's email, id, mobile, name, and phone. Default: false

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: If the userId is not mentioned, then the user whose API Key was used to make the API call will be consider the recepient.

api_list.name: makeAgent

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: occasional
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if this is an occasional agent (true => occasional, false => full-time)

optional_parameters.name: ticketScope
optional_parameters.description: Ticket permission of the agent (1 -> Global Access, 2 -> Group Access, 3 -> Restricted Access). Current logged in agent can't update his/her ticket_scope

optional_parameters.name: signature
optional_parameters.description: Signature of the agent in HTML format

optional_parameters.name: groupIds
optional_parameters.description: Group IDs associated with the agent

optional_parameters.name: roleIds
optional_parameters.description: Role IDs associated with the agent. Atleast one role should be assoicated with the agent. Current logged in agent can't update his/her role_ids

api_list.name: monitorForum

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the user who wishes to follow the forum. If the userId is not mentioned, then the user whose API Key was used to make the API call will be consider the recepient.

required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the user who wishes to follow the forum topic. If the userId is not mentioned, then the user whose API Key was used to make the API call will be consider the recepient.

api_list.name: restoreTicket

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

api_list.name: toggleTimer

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

api_list.name: unMonitorForum

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the user who wishes to unfollow the forum. If the userId is not mentioned, then the user whose API Key was used to make the API call will be consider the recepient.

api_list.name: unMonitorTopic

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the user who wishes to unfollow the forum topic. If the userId is not mentioned, then the user whose API Key was used to make the API call will be consider the recepient.

api_list.name: updateAgent

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: signature
optional_parameters.description: Signature of the agent in HTML format

optional_parameters.name: occasional
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if this is an occasional agent (true => occasional, false => full-time)

optional_parameters.name: ticketScope
optional_parameters.description: Ticket permission of the agent (1 -> Global Access, 2 -> Group Access, 3 -> Restricted Access). Current logged in agent can't update his/her ticket_scope

optional_parameters.name: mobile
optional_parameters.description: Mobile number of the Agent

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language of the Agent. Default language is 'en'

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Email address of the Agent.

optional_parameters.name: jobTitle
optional_parameters.description: Job title of the Agent

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description: Time zone of the Agent. Default value is time zone of the domain

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the Agent

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: Telephone number of the Agent.

optional_parameters.name: groupIds
optional_parameters.description: Group IDs associated with the agent. Example: 1,2

optional_parameters.name: roleIds
optional_parameters.description: Role IDs associated with the agent. Atleast one role should be assoicated with the agent. Current logged in agent can't update his/her role_ids

api_list.name: updateAvatar

required_parameters.name: avatar
required_parameters.description: Avatar image of the contact The maximum file size is 5MB and the supported file types are .jpg, .jpeg, .jpe, and .png

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

api_list.name: updateComment

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: answer
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if the comment is marked as the answer (for forum topics of type 'Question')

optional_parameters.name: body
optional_parameters.description: Content of the comment in HTML

api_list.name: updateCompany

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the company

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the company

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: Any specific note about the company

optional_parameters.name: customFields
optional_parameters.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields. Only dates in the format YYYY-MM-DD are accepted as input for custom date fields. Example: 'custom_fields':{'gadget':'Cold Welder'}

optional_parameters.name: domains
optional_parameters.description: Domains of the company. Email addresses of contacts that contain this domain will be associated with that company automatically.

api_list.name: updateContact

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: mobile
optional_parameters.description: Mobile number of the contact

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Primary email address of the contact. If you want to associate additional email(s) with this contact, use the other_emails attribute.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the contact

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: Telephone number of the contact

optional_parameters.name: viewAllTickets
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if the contact can see all the tickets that are associated with the company to which he belong

optional_parameters.name: twitterId
optional_parameters.description: Twitter handle of the contact

optional_parameters.name: companyId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the primary company to which this contact belongs

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: Address of the contact.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A small description of the contact

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Language of the contact. Default language is en. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Language feature is enabled (Garden plan and above)

optional_parameters.name: jobTitle
optional_parameters.description: Job title of the contact

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description: Time zone of the contact. Default value is the time zone of the domain. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Time Zone feature is enabled (Garden plan and above)

optional_parameters.name: otherEmails
optional_parameters.description: Additional emails associated with the contact

optional_parameters.name: otherCompanies
optional_parameters.description: Additional companies associated with the contact. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Companies feature is enabled (Estate plan and above)

optional_parameters.name: customFields
optional_parameters.description: Key value pairs containing the name and value of the custom field. Only dates in the format YYYY-MM-DD are accepted as input for custom date fields. Example: 'custom_fields':{'gadget':'Cold Welder'}

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: List tags associated with this contact

api_list.name: updateForum

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Unique name of Forum

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the forum category

optional_parameters.name: forumType
optional_parameters.description: Denotes the type of forum. 1 - How To's, 2- Ideas, 3 -Problems, 4 - Announcements

optional_parameters.name: forumVisibility
optional_parameters.description: Denotes the visibility level of the forum. 1 - Everyone, 2 - Logged in users only, 3 - Agents only, 4 - Users in specific companies only

optional_parameters.name: forumCategoryId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the category to which this forum belongs

optional_parameters.name: companyIdList
optional_parameters.description: List of CompanyID. If forumVisibility property is set to 4, the forum is only visible to users belonging to certain companies. Example: 1,2,3

api_list.name: updateForumCategory
api_list.description: Update Name or Description of Category

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Unique name of the forum category

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the forum category

api_list.name: updateGroup

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Unique name of the group

optional_parameters.name: unassignedFor
optional_parameters.description: The time after which an escalation email will be sent if a ticket remains unassigned. The accepted values are '30m' for 30 minutes, '1h' for 1 hour, '2h' for 2 hour, '4h' for 4 hour, '8h' for 8 hour, '12h' for 12 hour, '1d' for 1 day, '2d' for 2days, '3d' for 3 days. The default value is '30m'

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the group

optional_parameters.name: autoTicketAssign
optional_parameters.description: Describes the automatic ticket assignment type. Will not be supported if the 'Round Robin' feature is disabled for the account. The default value is false

optional_parameters.name: escalateTo
optional_parameters.description: The user to whom the escalation email is sent of a ticket is unassigned. To create/update escalate_to with 'none' provide the value 'null' in the request

optional_parameters.name: agentIdList
optional_parameters.description: List of Agent's ID

api_list.name: updateSolutionArticle

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: metaTitle
optional_parameters.description: Part of SEO-data

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the solution article

optional_parameters.name: agentId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the agent who created the solution article

optional_parameters.name: metaDescription
optional_parameters.description: Part of SEO-data

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Status of the solution article. (1 - draft, 2 - published)

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Title of the solution article

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Update a translated solution folder

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of the solution article. (1 - permenant, 2 - workaround)

optional_parameters.name: metaKeywords
optional_parameters.description: List of keywords. Part of SEO-data

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Tags that have been associated with the solution article

api_list.name: updateSolutionCategory

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Unique name of the solution category

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the solution category

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Update a translated solution category.

optional_parameters.name: visibleInPortals
optional_parameters.description: List of portal IDs where this category is visible. Allowed only if the account is configured with multiple portals. Example: 1,2,3

api_list.name: updateSolutionFolder

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the solution folder

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Unique name of the solution folder

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Update a translated solution folder

optional_parameters.name: visibility
optional_parameters.description: Folder visibility. 1 - All Users, 2 - Logged in Users, 3 - Agents, 4 - Selected Companies.

optional_parameters.name: companyIds
optional_parameters.description: List IDs of the companies to whom this solution folder is visible. Example: 1,2,3

api_list.name: updateTicket

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: facebookId
optional_parameters.description: Facebook ID of the requester. If no contact exists with this facebook_id, then a new contact will be created.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Helps categorize the ticket according to the different kinds of issues your support team deals with. The default Value is null.

optional_parameters.name: priority
optional_parameters.description: Priority of the ticket. The default value is 1.

optional_parameters.name: twitterId
optional_parameters.description: Twitter handle of the requester. If no contact exists with this handle in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact.

optional_parameters.name: requesterId
optional_parameters.description: User ID of the requester. For existing contacts, the requester_id can be passed instead of the requester's email.

optional_parameters.name: responderId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the agent to whom the ticket has been assigned

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: HTML content of the ticket.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Email address of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact.

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Status of the ticket. The default Value is 2.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the requester

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: Phone number of the requester. If no contact exists with this phone number in Freshdesk, it will be added as a new contact. If the phone number is set and the email address is not, then the name attribute is mandatory.

optional_parameters.name: subject
optional_parameters.description: Subject of the ticket. The default Value is null.

optional_parameters.name: frDueBy
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp that denotes when the first response is due

optional_parameters.name: productId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the product to which the ticket is associated. It will be ignored if the email_config_id attribute is set in the request.

optional_parameters.name: dueBy
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp that denotes when the ticket is due to be resolved

optional_parameters.name: emailConfigId
optional_parameters.description: ID of email config which is used for this ticket. (i.e.,  support@yourcompany.com/sales@yourcompany.com) If product_id is given and email_config_id is not given, product's primary email_config_id will be set

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: The channel through which the ticket was created. The default value is 2.

optional_parameters.name: groupId
optional_parameters.description: ID of the group to which the ticket has been assigned. The default value is the ID of the group that is associated with the given email_config_id

optional_parameters.name: companyId
optional_parameters.description: Company ID of the requester. This attribute can only be set if the Multiple Companies feature is enabled (Estate plan and above)

optional_parameters.name: attachments
optional_parameters.description: Array of file links (url). The total size of these attachments cannot exceed 15MB. You can only add new attachments to existed.

optional_parameters.name: ccEmails
optional_parameters.description: Array of email address added in the 'cc' field of the incoming ticket email

optional_parameters.name: customFields
optional_parameters.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields. Example: 'custom_fields':{'gadget':'Cold Welder'}

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Array of tags that have been associated with the ticket

api_list.name: updateTimeEntry

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: agentId
optional_parameters.description: The agent to whom this time-entry is associated. One agent can have only one timer running. Everything else will be stopped if new timer is on for an agent

optional_parameters.name: executedAt
optional_parameters.description: Time at which this time-entry id added/created. Format YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: timerRunning
optional_parameters.description: Indicates if the timer is running

optional_parameters.name: startTime
optional_parameters.description: The time at which the time-entry is added or the time of the last invoked 'start-timer' action using a toggle

optional_parameters.name: billable
optional_parameters.description: Set as true if the entry is billable. Default value is true

optional_parameters.name: timeSpent
optional_parameters.description: The number of hours (in hh:mm format). Used to set the total time_spent

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: Description on this time-entry

api_list.name: updateTopic

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain in freshdesk.com service. Example: your-company.freshdesk.com

optional_parameters.name: locked
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if the topic is locked which means that no more posts can be added to the topic

optional_parameters.name: sticky
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if the topic should stay on top of the forum for additional visibility
